en.name: Óscar Verdú
en.quote: Alex Malvehy is a top-notch graphic and motion designer. He's creative, reliable, and always brings fresh ideas to the table. Highly recommend him for any design work!

en.name: Aniol Pagès
en.career: Full-stack developer at Confraria de la Ratafia
en.quote: Alex Malvehy's innovative designs and motion graphics consistently exceed expectations. His creativity and professionalism make him an invaluable asset.

en.name: Llorenç Poy
en.quote: Working with Alex has been a game-changer for our design projects. His creativity and attention to detail always shine through, making him a go-to for any motion or graphic design work.

en.name: Patricio González
en.quote: Alex Malvehy is a fantastic graphic and motion designer who consistently delivers high-quality work. His creativity, attention to detail, and ability to bring fresh, engaging ideas make him a go-to for any design needs. He's not only talented but also a great communicator who always meets deadlines. If you're looking for someone to elevate your brand's visuals, I highly recommend Alex.

es.name: Alex Malvehy
es.quote: El diseño no es solo cómo se ve y se siente. El diseño es cómo funciona.

es.name: John Smith
es.quote: El buen diseño es buen negocio.

es.name: Emily Johnson
es.quote: El diseño agrega valor más rápido de lo que agrega costos.

es.name: Michael Brown
es.quote: El diseño es pensamiento hecho visual.

ca.name: Alex Malvehy
ca.quote: El disseny no és només com es veu i es sent. El disseny és com funciona.

ca.name: John Smith
ca.quote: El bon disseny és bon negoci.

ca.name: Emily Johnson
ca.quote: El disseny afegeix valor més ràpid del que afegeix costos.

ca.name: Michael Brown
ca.quote: El disseny és pensament fet visual.
